font_display: 'swap' }} {{ button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }} {{ text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }} .section-{{ section.id }} { border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px; border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px; margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem; margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem; border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px; overflow: hidden; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { margin: 0 auto; padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; } .slider-top-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; } .slider-heading-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; } .slider-heading-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ heading_color }}; line-height: {{ heading_height }}%; text-transform: unset; } .slider-button-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 10px; width: 100%; max-width: fit-content; margin: 0; font-size: {{ button_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ button_color }}; line-height: {{ button_height }}%; text-align: center; text-transform: unset; text-decoration: none; padding: {{ button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px; border-radius: {{ button_radius }}px; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; position: relative; font-weight: 700; z-index: 2; box-sizing: border-box; } .slider-button-{{ section.id }} svg { width: 14px; height: 14px; } .slider-button-{{ section.id }} svg path { fill: {{ button_color }}; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } .slider-button-{{ section.id }}:hover { color: {{ button_hover_color }}; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } .slider-button-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path { fill: {{ button_hover_color }}; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } .slider-slider-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ slider_mt_mobile }}px; overflow: visible !important; } .slider-slide-{{ section.id }} { text-decoration: none; } .slider-image-{{ section.id }} { overflow: hidden; border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px; border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }}; } .slider-image-{{ section.id }} img, .slider-image-{{ section.id }} svg { display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover } .slider-image-{{ section.id }} svg { background-color: #AFAFAF; } .slider-second-image-{{ section.id }} { display: none; } .slider-slide-{{ section.id }}:hover .slider-second-image-{{ section.id }} { display: block; } .slider-slide-{{ section.id }}:hover .slider-first-image-{{ section.id }} { display: none; } .slider-text-{{ section.id }} { padding: 0px {{ text_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px; margin-top: {{ text_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }}; } .slider-text-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ text_color }}; line-height: {{ text_height }}%; text-transform: unset; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } .slider-slide-{{ section.id }}:hover .slider-text-{{ section.id }} *{ opacity: 0.6; } .slider-navigation-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ navigation_mt_mobile }}px; padding-top: {{ navigation_pt_mobile }}px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; gap: 20px; border-top: {{ navigation_border_thickness }}px solid {{ navigation_border_color }}; } .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}, .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} { position: static !important; flex: 0 0 {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px; height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px; flex-shrink: 0; border: 0px; box-shadow: none; background: transparent; cursor: pointer; } .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg, .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg { display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; } .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path, .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path { fill: {{ arrow_color }}; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path, .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path { fill: {{ arrow_hover_color }}; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled, .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled { opacity: 0.3; } @media(min-width: 1024px) { .section-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px; margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem; margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem; border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { padding: 0 5rem; padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px; padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; } .slider-heading-{{ section.id }} * { font-size: {{ heading_size }}px; } .slider-button-{{ section.id }} { padding: {{ button_padding_vertical }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal }}px; font-size: {{ button_size }}px; } .slider-slider-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ slider_mt }}px; } .slider-text-{{ section.id }} { padding: 0px {{ text_padding_horizontal }}px; margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px; text-align: {{ text_align }}; } .slider-text-{{ section.id }} * { font-size: {{ text_size }}px; } .slider-navigation-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ navigation_mt }}px; padding-top: {{ navigation_pt }}px; } .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}, .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} { flex: 0 0 {{ arrow_size }}px; height: {{ arrow_size }}px; } } {%- endstyle -%} {% unless full_width %} {% endunless %} {% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %} {% endif %} {% if "non_outline" or button_style == "non_outline_arrow" %} {% elsif button_style == "outline" or button_style == "outline_arrow" %} {% elsif button_style == "link" %} {% endif %} {% if image_ratio_mobile
